title: Traffic Laws Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Florida traffic laws

questions.question: What is the maximum speed limit on Florida highways unless otherwise posted?
When approaching a school bus with flashing red lights, you must:
options: Slow down and proceed with caution
Stop and wait until the lights stop flashing
Honk your horn to alert the driver

questions.question: In Florida, you must yield the right-of-way to:
options: Emergency vehicles with lights and sirens
